Name: Saving Grace
About the game: What would it be like if some masked men took your daughter? What would you do? Would you meet their demands... Or suffer the loss. The choice is yours. Undertake this journey to get your daughter back... She's counting on you. Everyone is counting on you. Hell is real. If you do not stop this catastrophe, everyone you know, everyone you love will be damned. It rests on your shoulders. Will you bare the weight? or live in eternal pain as hell ascends to earth. Solve puzzles. Explore vast sandbox levels. Story driven. Full Keyboard/Mouse and Xbox controller support. Uncover the mysteries surrounding your family. Use your wits to slay evil with an array of arsenal. Uncover the dark truth to why your daughter was chosen. Face off against the embodiment of evil and punishment himself... The devil incarnate. Language Support Saving Grace has Subtitle support for 10 languages so far! The official languages translated by a human are: English French Russian Polish Turkish Serbian The other languages have been AI generated. If you would like to translate for Saving Grace please get in contact! You can join the Official Saving Grace discord pinned in the Community Hub announcements Or contact me directly Via Twitter or my Support email. Thank you! Saving Grace is a solo indie project and I thank you so much, for taking the time to view my game page! If the game interests you, please consider purchasing and playing, and reviewing it! -Thomas Ironmonger, Thomas09 Games.
